pageProduct.name: Optifresh Tears Unit Dose Eye Drops 0.5% 0.4mL 30
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Lubrication eye drops for long lasting and soothing relief and protection against burning, irritation and discomfort due to ocular dryness or exposure to environmental factors. For moderate to severe dry eyes.

Warnings

This product is for external ophthalmic use only
Do not use if container is damaged
Do not use if you are sensitive to an of the ingredients
Do no use after the expiry date shown on carton
Do not touch the eye with the tip of the container
After administration, in rare cases, a slight temporary blurring of vision my be observed due to the viscosity of the solutions; it is there fore advisable to wait for a few seconds before activity that requires clear vision
Wait at least 10-15 minutes before instilling any other ophthalmic drug
Once opened each vial can be used for up to 12 hours
Keep out of reach of children
Do not swallow
Store below 25degreess Celcius. Protect from light

Ingredients

carmellose sodium, lactic acid, sodium hydroxide, sodium chloride, potassium chloride, calcium chloride dihydrate, water for injections

Directions

1 drop in the affected eye 2-3 times daily or as required. 1-2 drop directly on the contact lenses before application
